info.name: CAST viewer
info.description:
This application integrates the ASCIInema Player into Nextcloud. Using this application users can view their CAST files online without the need to download the file.
When this application is enabled publicly shared CAST documents will also get shown in the CAST Player instead of only showing a single static snapshot of the document. The Cast Player requires a modern browser and will not work with Microsoft® Internet Explorer® versions below 9.
ASCIInema Player is a JavaScript library developed by Marcin Kulik, you can learn more about the project at [https://github.com/asciinema/asciinema-player](https://github.com/asciinema/asciinema-player)
info.author: Thomas Müller, Lukas Reschke, Jan Reiss
